name: Rock&Troll
description:
Trolls are stone during the day, but bloodthirsty monsters during the night. Armed with only a sword you have to stay alive for as long as possible. Your only ally, an old lady who takes your hard earned gold, and sometimes, if she feels like it, rewards you with random buff. Oh yeah, and she disappears at night. Good Luck Adventurer.

Controlls:

A and D - move left and right.

Space - to jump.

Mouse1 - to attack.
